Sioux_Falls.KELO (AM):
KELO (1320 AM, "Newstalk 1320 KELO" is an AM radio station licensed to Sioux Falls, South Dakota, airing a news/talk format. It is owned by Midwest Communications, Inc.


== History ==
KELO signed on as KGSS on 1200 kHz in October, 1937, under the ownership of Midcontinent Broadcasting Company.
